page.title: 08LEISURE AROUND BROSELEY
page.content:
There are many ways that people spend their leisure time.
There are sports clubs for{cricket, {football and tennis.}People can play {snooker and bowls}at the Social Club, but for other sports they need to go to Bridgnorth or Telford. There is also a{Ramblers'}group and a{riding stables.
The Labour, Liberal and Conservative {political parties}each have local groups in the area.
The{Broseley Society}are trying to presrve Broseley as an attractive place to live, and the Carnival Committee organise a{carnival}each {August.
